meanings.definition: A short poem or other set of words set to music or meant to be sung.
meanings.sent1: She loved to listen to her favorite songs on the radio.
meanings.sent2: The concert was filled with beautiful songs that touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent3: The cat meowed along to the songs playing on the TV.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a symphony of joyful songs filling the room.
meanings.sent5: The songs of the birds in the morning brought a sense of peace to the garden.

meanings.definition: A musical composition intended to be performed by the human voice.
meanings.sent1: The choir sang a variety of songs at the music festival.
meanings.sent2: His favorite part of the opera was when the tenor sang the solo songs.
meanings.sent3: The songs performed by the robots at the tech fair were surprisingly melodic.
meanings.sent4: Her voice carried the songs across the room, captivating everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The songs of the sailors echoed through the harbor, creating a haunting melody.
